title: Science Instructional Design Practice Knowledge-Sharing Workshop via Online Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design concepts and subject matter knowledge in science
context.additional_context: Capacity-building for utilizing online communities to improve science curriculum design

learning_goals: Derive and apply three or more science instructional design strategies through community-based knowledge exchange
Systematic organization of peers' practical knowledge is possible using an online community analysis tool (NLP-based).
Science curriculum design improvements can be revised at least twice based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
